net.sf.JRecord.CsvParser

Interface ICsvCharLineParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseCsvLineParser, BasicCsvLineParser, BasicCsvLineParserExtended, StandardCsvLineParser

    public interface ICsvCharLineParser
    Interface describing a CSV line parser - A class to break a line into the fields using a field-Seperator String
    Author:
    Bruce Martin

        Parameters:
